name: 故郷をさがす三姉妹/ The Three Sisters looking for their back home.
detailed_description:
This is an experimentation of recreating the dream, much more than a game.
You can stroll in the world which the creator has actually dreamed.
Your dream can proceed with guidance written on the button for the destination.

Features:

  • The world used the original handcrafted figures
  • Emulator of the dream
  • Single-player
  • Short playtime
  • First-person point of view

Control:

  • arrow keys - moveSHIFT
  • SPACEBAR - jump
  • W A S D -move a viewpoint

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 64bits or later
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700HQ CPU @ 2.80GHz 2.81GHz
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 630 or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
